articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Peruvian President-Elect
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Peruvian President-Elect
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on June 10 sent a congratulatory message to Ollanta Moises Humala Tasso upon his election as president of Peru.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him success in his responsible work for stability and development of the country and well-being of the people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Latvia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Latvia
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Andris Berzins on his election as president of Latvia.
					 Kim in the message wished him success in the work for the prosperity of the country and the well-being of the people.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Central Hall of Workers on Tuesday to mark the 11th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, said in his report at the meeting:
					
					The June 15 joint declaration is a great program for national reunification provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who has worked heart and soul for reunification, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He provided the historic Pyongyang meeting in June 2000 to adopt the north-south joint declaration and announced the declaration for development of inter-Korean relations, peace and prosperity in October 2007, the reporter noted, adding:
					
					 Over the last ten odd years since the publication of the joint declaration the Korean nation has accelerated the reunification movement, cherishing deep reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il represents all victory and glory of the Koreans and is the great lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 The reporter called upon the Korean people to get closely united around Kim Jong Il and remain faithful to his idea on national reunification and leadership.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should turn out as one in the struggle to frustrate the south Korean conservative ruling forces' vicious moves for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen and achieve the peace and independent reunification of the country, he stressed, saying:
					
					 We extend full support and encouragement to the just struggle of various political parties and people of different social standings in south Korea for social democracy and national reunification and will strive to implement the joint declaration together with them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of public organizations, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the north headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, officials concerned and working people in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Head of CPC Delegation on Sino-DPRK Relations
articles.content:
Head of CPC Delegation on Sino-DPRK Relations
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau and the Secretariat of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and head of its Organization Department, mentioned the China-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations growing stronger with each passing day.
					 China and the DPRK are friendly neighbors sharing mountains and rivers, he said, adding:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, together with Chinese comrades, waged the struggle against the common enemy during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 In the course he laid solid foundation for the China-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The President is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the Chinese people.
					
					 Bilateral exchange and cooperation are growing stronger this year.
					
					 In May General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China. He exchanged exhaustive view on the issues of common concern and reached an important agreement with General Secretary Hu Jintao.
					
					 His China visit contributed to developing the traditional China-DPRK friendship onto a new stage.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to develop the bilateral relations of friendship.
					
					 We will, together with Korean comrades, strive for the beautiful future of the China-DPRK friendship, true to the intention of the supreme leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Italian Guests Here
articles.content:
Italian Guests Here
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, and his companion arrived here on Tuesday by air.

articles.title: Local Elections to Be Held
articles.content:
Local Elections to Be Held
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Elections for deputies to provincial (municipality), city (district) and county people's assemblies will take place in the DPRK on July 24 in accordance with Article 139 of the Socialist Constitution and decisions of the local people's committees.
					 The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly announced a report in this regard on Monday.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Demonstration Group Performs in US
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Demonstration Group Performs in US
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Taekwon-Do Demonstration Group of the Korean Taekwon-DO Committee staged the first demonstration performance in Boston City, Massachusetts State on June 11.
					 A DPRK flag was seen hanging in the hall.
					
					 It was watched by many Americans in various states including Massachusetts State and Koreans in the U.S. 
					
					 Speeches were made before the demonstration performance.
					
					 Then, the DPRK Taekwon-Do players staged demonstration performance of 16 numbers including Taekwon-Do exercise for health.
					
					 The spectators sent warm applause to the players with deep admiration each time they demonstrated the might of Taekwon-Do, the orthodox martial art and pride of the Korean nation, and presented admirable technical movements.
					
					 The group staged the second demonstration performance in New York on June 12.
					
					 Crowded in the hall were Americans and Koreans from New York City, New York State and other places.
					
					 After the national anthem of the DPRK was played, there represented numbers of Taekwon-do pulsating with the resourcefulness and spirit of the Korean nation.

articles.title: World Blood Donor Day Marked
articles.content:
World Blood Donor Day Marked 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- An event was held in the DPRK on June 14 to mark the World Blood Donor Day.
					 Participating in the event were officials of the Ministry of Public Health and in the related field and voluntary non-remunerated blood donors.
					
					  On hand were staff members of the mission of the WHO and UNICEF and the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK and foreign guests.
					
					  Speeches were made at the event.
					
					  They underscored the need to successfully make blood donation now under way with the cooperation of the WHO and the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
					
					 Certificates were handed to voluntary non-remunerated blood donors and a video was shown.
					
					 After video was shown, the participants looked round photos on display and enjoyed a performance given by the central art squad for agitation for increased production on the occasion of the day.

articles.title: Briefing on RC Activities for Blood Donation Held
articles.content:
Briefing on RC Activities for Blood Donation Held
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A briefing on Red Cross activities for voluntary blood donation took place at the South Phyongan Province  Blood Transfusion Centre on Tuesday, the World Blood Donor Day.
					 Present at the briefing were officials of the South Phyongan Provincial Branch Office of the DPRK Red Cross Society and RC volunteers. 
					
					Introduced at the briefing were such admirable deeds as donating blood, skin pieces and bones to those who met with accidents or are in a critical condition. 
					
					 Some volunteers were given official commendations for their blood donation.
					
					 Officials of the center explained what should be observed in blood donation and transfusion and in taking care of donors' health.
					
					 The DPRK Red Cross Society, in cooperation with the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, has updated blood transfusion centres in Pyongyang and provinces, sponsored short courses on blood donation and conducted information activities for expanding the number of blood donors.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 94 Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 94 Off Press
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 94 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works", a library of the Juche idea which systematically and comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order. 
					 The book contains 41 works including historic talks, speeches and conclusions made by President Kim Il Sung from August Juche 82 (1993) to July Juche 83 (1994).
					
					 The work "Five Tasks of Party Cells" clarifies the original idea and policy of strengthening the party, the staff of the revolution, increasing its role and ensuring the party leadership over the socialist cause.
					
					"Talk with the Chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Belgium" and "Socialism of Our Country Is One of Juche" and other works give perfect answers to the Juche-oriented revolutionary principle to be adhered to in the revolutionary party building and party activities, the essential character and advantages and invincibility of socialism in the DPRK.
					
					 The book indicates the tasks and ways for thoroughly carrying out the revolutionary economic strategy of the party and bringing about a new surge in the socialist economic construction. And it contains works giving lucid answers to issues arising in providing a new phase of the country's reunification.
					
					 "On Some Tasks before the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan at Present", "Korean Women in Commerce in Japan Should Make Efforts for the Prosperity and Development of the Country" and other works clarify the issues of consolidating the Chongryon organization and widely conducting the  patriotic work among Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Also contained in the book are works clarifying theoretical and practical issues arising in successfully bringing up the members of the Children's Union as successors to the revolution, consistently materializing the idea of independence, peace and friendship as required by the prevailing situation and strengthening the international solidarity with the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Builders for Overseas Projects before Full House
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Builders for Overseas Projects before Full House
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The performance by the art group of builders for overseas projects is going on before full house at the People's Palace of Culture.
					The performance which raised its curtain on June 10 is drawing a capacity audience every day.
					
					The performance that started with narration and chorus "May of Victory" gripped the hearts of the audience from its very beginning as it truthfully represented the militant spirit of the Korean working class who has recorded an immoral heroic epic in the nation's history of prosperity under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Every number replete with the worth of fruitful labor, ardent enthusiasm and rich emotion made revolutionary optimism prevail in the theatre.
					
					 Witticism "Let's live a highly civilized life", instrumental ensemble and story-telling "Straight" and other numbers were of high cognitive and educational value as they fully reflected the spirit of the times.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Trade Union Members Tour Revolutionary Sites in Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Trade Union Members Tour Revolutionary Sites in Mt. Paektu Area
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Trade union officials and members from across the country made a study tour of the revolutionary sites and battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the lapse of 55 years since General Secretary Kim Jong Il explored the course of study tour of the sites.
					They laid floral baskets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower, the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, the shore of Lake Samji and the Chongbong Bivouac and the mosaic of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu erected in the Mt. Paektu secret camp.
					
					Then they started their tour, following in the peerlessly great persons' sacred footsteps.
					
					In Pochonbo they deeply grasped the rare military strategy and war tactics of the President.
					
					In Samjiyon they went round the Samjiyon Grand Monument and group sculptures of subsidiary themes there after being briefed on it and visited the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum.
					
					They made the rounds of the area of Samjiyon Township which underwent radical changes.
					
					On Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of revolution, they hardened their resolution to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered there, looking back on the revolutionary history and undying feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					They held an oath-taking meeting in front of leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Mt. Paektu secret camp.

articles.title: Sand Art Enjoys Popularity
articles.content:
Sand Art Enjoys Popularity
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Studio recently gave a sand-drawing performance, winning popularity among audience.
					 Artists draw pictures with sand on glass, accompanied by music. The drawing is projected on screen.
					
					 The performance was excellent in artistry, national in form and socialist in content.  
					
					 The pictures were all acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 The new kind of the stage art is conducive to public entertainment.

articles.title: Stevia Becomes Diverse in Use
articles.content:
Stevia Becomes Diverse in Use
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Stevia, a perennial plant, has become diverse in use in the DPRK. 
					 Dr. Ri Tong Jo of Pyongyang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University told KCNA that a good species of stevia has already been bred and methods of its cultivation and sugar extraction developed.
					
					 Its cultivation acreage has been expanded in the country.
					
					 Foodstuff factories have built stevia farms and refineries.
					
					 Stevioside is high in economic effectiveness and stronger in sugar flavor than soft sugar.
					
					 It causes no change in color and taste when it is used in making foodstuffs.
					
					 It is also used for medicines and cosmetics.
					
					 Wastes from stevia-processed goods are good feed for domestic animals and fish.

articles.title: High-yield Strawberry Bred
articles.content:
High-yield Strawberry Bred
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Researchers of Pyongyang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University have bred a high-yield species of strawberry.
					 The new species contains 11.01 percent of sugar and 0.58 percent of acidity. It weighs 23 grams per fruit and 345 grams per plant.
					
					 It, sweeter and more fragrant than other species, is of vivid red color.
					
					 It is strong in resistance to epidemics and cold. It can stand even 16 degrees below zero. 
					
					 It is fruitful for four years.
					
					 It has proved suitable for the climatic and soil conditions of Korea.

articles.title: US Frantic Arms Buildup under Fire
articles.content:
US Frantic Arms Buildup under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- U.S. arms buildup is now being stepped up in real earnest in Northeast Asia, says Rodong Sinmun in a by-lined commentary.
					 Citing facts to prove this, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' escalation of arms buildup in this region lays bare their extreme ambition for hegemony. 
					
					 The U.S. is attaching particular importance to Northeast Asia in carrying out its strategy for aggression against Asia and its scenario for world domination and seeks an unchallenged edge in this region.
					
					 It is in pursuance of its scenario for hegemony that it is busy massively reinforcing and deploying modern arms and equipment in Northeast Asia under the disguise of preserving "security" and "keeping the command of air and giving spurs to the development of fighters of new generation.
					
					 The U.S. loudmouthed "security" is, in essence, a call for beefing up its forces and a doctrine of aggression.
					
					 It is the U.S. strategic calculation that it can realize its ambition to dominate the Asia-Pacific region and, furthermore, put the world under its domination only when Northeast Asia is put under its control by force of arms.
					
					 There has existed in Northeast Asia since the period of the Cold War a structure of confrontation between the reactionary forces led by the U.S. and China, Russia and other countries. Ever since the outset of the new century the U.S. has stepped up the establishment of the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea and forward-deployed modern arms and equipment in Northeast Asia, creating the danger of  a new Cold War and arms race in this region.
					
					 Countries including China and Russia are following with high vigilance its arms buildup in Northeast Asia and taking steps to bolster the military capability to cope with the possible situation in the future.
					
					 Its reckless military actions only result in seriously disturbing peace and stability and increasing the danger of a war in the above-said region.

articles.title: S. Korea's Moves to Enact "Law on Human Rights Issue in North Korea" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Moves to Enact "Law on Human Rights Issue in North Korea" Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group's recent moves to enact the "law on human rights issue in north Korea" are a vivid reflection of the deep-rooted hostility toward the DPRK and the evermore frantic moves to escalate the confrontation between the north and the south as they are a blatant political provocation to it. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a by-lined commentary.
					
					 The puppet forces are working hard to increase the political pressure upon the DPRK internally and externally while floating misinformation that there is "human rights issue" there in a bid to mislead the public opinion but it is as foolish an act as trying to sweep the sea with a broom.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's desperate moves to cook up the above-said law are aimed at bringing down the dignified socialist system and realizing its ambition to achieve "the unification of the systems" in anticipation of "a contingency," a fiction. Herein lies the treacherous and criminal nature of the moves to enact the said law.
					
					 The above-said moves are an absolutely unpardonable political provocation intended to introduce the corrupt legal system in south Korea to the DPRK. The fabrication of such evil law at the puppet National Assembly would be little short of its formal declaration that it does not legally recognize the DPRK's dignity, sovereignty and its socialist system.
					
					 Should the puppet forces enact the law at any cost despite of the DPRK's strong warnings, the inter-Korean relations will be declared completed frozen and neither visit nor contact can take place thenceforth.
					
					 If the Lee group does not want to see such catastrophic situation, it had better stop such reckless moves, though belatedly, so it may not suffer such shame as retracting the law later.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Call for More Stringent "Sanctions" against DPRK Snubbed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Call for More Stringent "Sanctions" against DPRK Snubbed
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese ambassador to the U.N., made an admonitory speech at a meeting of delegates of developing countries at the U.N., asserting that it is necessary to sincerely implement the "sanctions" against the DPRK and the like.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 His admonitory speech made before them is nothing but a political cartoon to be jeered by people.
					
					 Japanese are voicing ever-mounting grievances about the ruling quarters for failing to take proper government measures to defuse the crisis caused by the earthquake and the nuclear accident.
					
					 Under the political situation prevailing in Japan where a regime change is about to take place and it is floundering in chronic political mayhem its neighboring countries are at a loss with whom they should discuss pending issues.
					
					 Even under this difficult situation the Japanese reactionaries are free to utter this or that about other's affair, poking its nose into it. This clearly suggests what extent their moral degeneration has reached.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that they seem to pin a considerable hope on what they called "tightened sanctions".
					
					 The ideology and system chosen by the Korean people remain unshaken in any harsh "sanctions".
					
					 Their reckless behavior crying out for the tightened "sanctions" against the DPRK, failing to face up to the above-said reality, provokes more ridicule than wrath among the Korean people.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to mind its own business before pulling up others.

articles.title: Halt to Construction of Jeju Naval Base Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to Construction of Jeju Naval Base Demanded
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Measure Council for Checking the Construction of Jeju Naval Base made up of at least 110 civic and public organizations issued a commentary on June 9 condemning the puppet authorities for pushing forward the construction of the base for aggression.
					 The commentary denounced the "government" and the military authorities for going ahead with the construction of the naval base and justifying their crimes while spreading misinformation that Jeju islanders agreed with it.
					
					 It is an insult to the Jeju islanders now in their staunch struggle against the base construction.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop the construction at once.

articles.title: End to Unequal Relations between S. Korea and US Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
End to Unequal Relations between S. Korea and US Demanded in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A memorial picture exhibition was held in Seoul on June 8 on the lapse of 9 years since two schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son were brutally killed by an armored car of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea.
					 Attending the opening ceremony of the exhibition were members of civic and public organizations including the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Solidarity for Progress, the General Federation of National Artists and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and lawmakers from opposition parties.
					
					 Speakers said at the ceremony that they could not repress resentment at the hair-raising atrocity GIs committed by driving their armored car over the two schoolgirls, killing them in cold blood on a roadside, on June 13, 2002.
					
					 But GI criminals escaped punishment under the unequal south Korea-U.S. SOFA, they recalled, deploring that such humiliating relations still remain unchanged.
					
					 The people are becoming increasingly vocal in their demand for the revision of the SOFA, they noted.
					
					 They stressed the need to terminate the unequal relations with the U.S. and for the U.S. forces to make full apology and reparation for all their crimes in south Korea.

articles.title: GNP Accused of Defiling Candlelight Actions
articles.content:
GNP Accused of Defiling Candlelight Actions 
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea in a statement on June 9 denounced the "Grand National Party" for defiling the candlelight actions of university students and people from all walks of life for the settlement of the registration fee.
					 The statement said that a lawmaker from the GNP let loose a string of balderdash that those forces who participated in the candlelight demonstrations against the import of American beef in 2008 are conducting "agitation under the pretext of registration fee" after joining students.
					
					 This proves that he is utterly ignorant of what is going on in the world, it noted, adding that angry university students and people from all walks of life are turning out in the streets with candlelights in hands because Lee Myung Bak and the GNP are again pulling the wool over the eyes of the people without fulfilling their commitment to halve the registration fee.
					
					 If the GNP feels afraid of the candlelight actions, it should pass a bill on the settlement of the registration fee issue through the "National Assembly" at once, drop the policy for reducing taxes of the rich and stop the projects for improving the four large rivers, it held.
					
					 It urged the GNP and the Lee Myung Bak "government" to abandon at once the bad habit of defiling the people who are holding candlelights and meet the people's demand for halving the registration fee.

articles.title: S. Koreans Called for Inheriting Spirit of June Popular Resistance
articles.content:
S. Koreans Called for Inheriting Spirit of June Popular Resistance 
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement on June 10 called for steadily carrying forward the spirit of the June Popular Resistance.
					 24 years ago, people from all walks of life turned out in the streets of resistance, chanting anti-U.S. and anti-dictatorship slogans and those for democracy, the statement said.
					
					 The struggle of the people aspiring after independence, democracy and progressive politics is being still carried forward, it noted, calling on the people of all social strata to turn out as one by inheriting the spirit of the June resistance to eliminate the sycophantic traitors and reunify the country under the banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: S. Korea: Students Protest Illegal Actions at Universities
articles.content:
S. Korea: Students Protest Illegal Actions at Universities
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Students of universities in south Korea launched a joint struggle against the illegal actions at universities in Seoul on June 9.
					 They included Daegu University, Duksong Women's University, Dongduk Women's University, Sangji University and Sejong University.
					
					 The students noted that many private universities and colleges are now perpetrating illegal acts such as peculation and those expelled from them due to their wrongs are being reinstated one after another.
					
					 Those schools raise the registration fee as they wish while engaging themselves on such irregularities under the "law on private schools" the "Grand National Party" revised in its favor when it was in opposition, they charged.
					
					 They stressed the need to amend this law without fail in order to halve the registration fee.
					
					 That day student representatives had their hair cut short in protest against the puppet authorities' unpopular education policy and the illegal acts of the school sides.

articles.title: Special Plenary Meeting of British Political Party Held
articles.content:
Special Plenary Meeting of British Political Party Held
						
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A special plenary meeting of the C.C., the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) was held in London on June 4 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the 47th anniversary of the start of his work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and his successful unofficial visit to China.
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					Chairman Harpal Brar and Vice-Chairman and concurrently International Secretary Ella Rule of the C.C., the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and other speakers highly praised Kim Jong Il for his undying feats performed in building the WPK into an invincible party with experienced and tested leadership ability, a mother party serving the people and a ruling party under socialism steering the cause of building a thriving nation and the human cause of independence.
					
					 His seventh visit to China in the new century indicates his energetic and tireless revolutionary activities, they said, noting that the recent China visit proved that the DPRK-China relations are particular ones between comrades and brothers and sisters sealed in blood in the struggle against the common enemies, not simple ordinary ties between the neighboring countries.
					
					 The DPRK-China friendship which has developed generation after generation despite the complicated change of the international situation will last forever, they stressed.
					
					 They expressed conviction that they would as ever regard it as one of the important duties of the party activities to extend positive support and solidarity to the WPK and the DPRK and further intensify the solidarity activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded Abroad 
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on June 6 to mark the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and congratulate him on his historic unofficial visit to China. They included a meeting in Romania and a meeting, film show and photo exhibition in Bangladesh.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were photographs dealing with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the events. 
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said that Kim Jong Il has further glorified the Juche idea founded by the President as a guiding idea of the era through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities. 
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il's visit to China in May was a historic event as it demonstrated before the world once again that the DPRK-China friendship is ever-lasting. 
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, adviser of the Bangladesh Barisal Society for the Study of the Songun Policy, and other speakers noted that Kim Jong Il's visit to China made a great contribution to boosting the friendship and unity and solidarity among the countries aspiring after independence and socialism and ensuring peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					 They praised him as the most outstanding leader of the present era guiding the world politics and the development of the international relations. 
					
					 The participants in the film show watched DPRK film "Pyongyang at Night".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Praised by Beninese Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Praised by Beninese Political Party
						
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin-Baanitee issued a statement on June 8 on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of his work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Kim Jong Il has wisely led the WPK for nearly half a century,  developing it into a powerful party of President Kim Il Sung, the statement said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il clarified that the revolutionary idea of the President is the great guiding idea in the present times and authored famous works including "Socialism Is a Science", proving the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism with his perfect logics, it noted.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin-Baanitee will positively support the WPK in the struggle to open the gate to a thriving nation at an early date under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, it concluded.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of His Work at WPK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of His Work at WPK Observed Abroad
						
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried portraits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photographs dealing with his revolutionary activities and articles on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A Nepali paper in an article said on June 6 that the DPRK is a country where the leader, the party and the popular masses are single-mindedly united. 
					
					 Noting that all the Korean people entirely entrust their destiny to Kim Jong Il, the paper stressed that no force on earth can break their single-minded unity around their leader. 
					
					 Another paper of the country on June 5 and the paper of Democratic Congo La Prosperity on June 8 said in their articles that he has developed the WPK into the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and the ever-victorious and steel-strong one, while speaking highly of his immortal exploits and personality as a popular revolutionary who glorified the Juche idea as a guiding idea of mankind through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The June issue of the German paper Die Rote Fahne dealt with the world-startling events which have taken place in the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, adding that the Korean people repose profound trust in him as he is working day and night, dedicating his all to the happiness of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Newspaper
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The 185th issue of the Romanian newspaper Romania Muncitoare carried the gist of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party".
					 The work, published on January 3, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies the historic lesson of socialist construction and validity of the general line of the Workers' Party of Korea for it.

articles.title: Fatal Radioactive Substances Ceaselessly Detected in Japan
articles.content:
Fatal Radioactive Substances Ceaselessly Detected in Japan
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Dangerous radioactive substances have been recently and continuously detected at the crippled Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant of Japan, arousing deep apprehension.
					Tokyo Electric Power Co. said that strontium, one of fatal radioactive substances, was found in underground water of the plant and seawater near it.
					
					The substance, whose effect on human body is more fatal than cesium and iodine detected so far, has been found in soil in Fukushima Prefecture since mid-April.
					
					However, this is the first time strontium was detected in groundwater and seawater, TEPCO said. Strontium measured in seawater was 240 times the normal levels.
					
					Experts have said it proves that the radioactive contamination level in not only ground but also marine is very serious.
					
					In another development, curium and americium were found out in the prefecture.
					
					Curium was detected in Okuma cho located three kilometers from the plant, the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology reported, saying that it is a dangerous nuclear substance.
					
					It was confirmed by TEPCO that the water contaminated with high level of radiation has been running into the sea.
					
					According to its survey into seawater in around the plant, 5.6 Bq of iodine-131 per 1cc of seawater was detected at the intake of nuclear reactor No. 2, which meant 140 times the normal levels.
					
					Radioactive substances have been found in seawater near intakes of other reactors, too.
					
					Amid the growing radiation crisis, minute amount of cesium was detected in breast milk of some mothers with suckling residing in eight prefectures including Fukushima and Miyagi.
					
					The damage by the killer quake and tsunami is increasing in scale.
					
					The number of deaths totaled to 15,413 and that of those missing to 8,069 as of June 11, according to the Police Agency.
					
					Meanwhile, 500 afterquakes with above 5 magnitude had been recorded until 08:00 of June 2 after the killer quake in March, said Tokyo Shimbun.

articles.title: China Gives Importance to Building Study-type Party Organization
articles.content:
China Gives Importance to Building Study-type Party Organization
						
 Beijing, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of China issued an order to build study-type party organization after seriously reviewing its historical experience and giving scientific analysis into the new situation and duty, said Liu Yunshan, head of the Publicity Department of the CPC Central Committee, on June 10.
					 Speaking at an experience-sharing meeting held in Hang Zhou city, Zhejiang Province, Liu stressed the need to deepen the study of the achievements made in enriching the party theory, encourage the good habit of studying and improve the study method and thus steadily raise the standard of putting the building of study-type party organization on a scientific basis.

articles.title: China Develops Solar Energy
articles.content:
China Develops Solar Energy 
 Beijing, June 12 (KCNA) -- China is directing efforts to building power stations based on solar heat as part of the development of solar energy.
					 The generating capacity of the already built power stations is about 1 million kilowatt.
					
					 It is reported that the capacity will increase to 10 million kilowatt by 2015.

Israeli Army Detains 8 Palestinians
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Israeli army is continuing the arrest of Palestinians despite the protest of the international community.
					 It arrested eight Palestinians on Friday during its raids in the West Bank cities of Jenin and Nablus.

articles.title: Two NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan

Two NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
						
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers in Afghanistan met deaths during the attack operation of the resistance forces of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reúne con la delegación del PCCh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reúne con la delegación del PCCh
						
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, recibió el día 13 a la delegación del Partido Comunista de China presidida por Li Yuanchao, miembro del Buró Político y del Secretariado y jefe del Departamento de Organización del Comité Central del PCCh, de visita en Corea.
					En la ocasión participaron Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comisión Militar Central del PTC, Ri Yong Ho, miembro permanente del Buró Político del CC del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejército Popular de Corea, Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del Buró Político y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, y Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC.
					
					Li Yuanchao transmitió a Kim Jong Il el saludo cordial de parte de Hu Jintao, Secretario General del CC del PCCh y Presidente de la República Popular China, y dedicó presentes a él y a Kim Jong Un.
					
					Señalando que la reciente visita extraoficial a la RPCh del Secretario General Kim Jong Il tiene suma importancia especial para fortalecer en una etapa más alta la solidaridad y las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperación entre los dos partidos y dos países, subrayó que el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo chinos evalúan altamente la contribución del Secretario General al desarrollo de la amistad China-Corea.
					
					Continuó que el partido y el gobierno de China mantienen la invariable orientación de forjar un futuro maravilloso de las relaciones bilaterales al dar firme continuidad a la tradicional y especial amistad China-Corea, en que está grabado el noble espíritu de los revolucionarios de generación veterana de ambos países, y ejecutar sinceramente los acuerdos amplios alcanzados por los máximos dirigentes de los dos países durante la reciente visita a China del Dirigente.
					
					Kim Jong Il expresó la voluntad del PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC de fortalecer aún más las relaciones de amistad y cooperación conforme al noble propósito de los dirigentes de generación veterana de ambos países y al deseo de los pueblos coreano y chino.
					
					Señaló que ambas partes deben aprender una de la otra e intercambiar las experiencias en muchos aspectos y evaluó la marcha exitosa de las conversaciones entre las delegaciones de ambos partidos sostenidas esta vez en Pyongyang.
					
					El Dirigente ofreció un almuerzo en honor de los huéspedes chinos.
					
					A la ocasión fueron invitados Li Yuanchao, jefe de la delegación china, Wang Jiarui, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Sun Zhengcai, secretario del Comité Provincial del PCCh en Jilin, Liu Hongcai, embajador chino en Corea, Pan Ligang, director de buró del Departamento de Organización del CC del PCCh, Li Xi, jefe del Departamento de Organización del Comité Municipal del PCCh en Shanghai, Shi Taifeng, jefe del Departamento de Organización del Comité Provincial del PCCh en Jiangsu, Yang Yanyi, asistente al jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, y otros acompañantes chinos.
					
					También participaron Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros coreanos.
					
					La recepción transcurrió en un clima ameno.

articles.title: Acto central por 11º aniversario de Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Acto central por 11º aniversario de Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio
						
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el día 14 en la capitalina Casa Central de Obreros el acto central por el 11º aniversario de la publicación de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					El informe de la ocasión estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del Buró Político del Comité Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la República Popular Democrática de Corea.
					
					El informante señaló que la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio es el gran programa de reunificación de la patria preparado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dedicó todos sus esfuerzos espirituales y físicos a lograr la reintegración de la patria, en acato al noble propósito del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					En la histórica Cumbre Norte-Sur celebrada en junio del 89 (2000) de la Era Juche en Pyongyang, el Dirigente publicó ese documento, y en octubre de 2007 proclamó la Declaración para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y la Prosperidad, recordó.
					
					Durante más de diez años que datan de la publicación de la Declaración Conjunta, la nación coreana impulsó el movimiento por la reunificación guardando la infinita veneración hacia el Dirigente, dijo.
					
					El Dirigente es el símbolo de todas las victorias y glorias del pueblo coreano y gran salvador de la reunificación de la patria, alabó y subrayó la necesidad de apoyar con fidelidad su idea y dirección en materia de la reunificación de la patria uniéndose compactamente en torno a él.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben levantarse unánimemente en la lucha por la paz y la reunificación independiente de país frustrando las brutales maniobras de confrontación fratricida de las fuerzas gobernantes conservadoras del Sur de Corea, apuntó.
					
					Enviaremos entero apoyo y solidaridad a la justa lucha de varios partidos políticos y los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea por la democratización de la sociedad y la reintegración territorial del país y haremos ingentes esfuerzos por ejecutar la Declaración Conjunta, concluyó.
					
					En el acto participaron Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de las entidades sociales, los miembros del Comité Norteño para la Ejecución de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de las direcciones norteñas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificación de la Patria (APRP) y de la Alianza Pannacional de la Juventud y los Estudiantes por la Reunificación de la Patria (Pomchonghakryon) y los funcionarios correspondientes junto con trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: Partido político de Gran Bretaña apoya visita a China de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Partido político de Gran Bretaña apoya visita a China de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el día 4 en Londres el pleno especial del Comité Central del Partido Comunista de Gran Bretaña (Marxista-Leninista) con motivo del 47º aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comité Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y en felicitación de éxitos en su visita extraoficial a la República Popular China.
					Varias personalidades hicieron uso de la palabra.
					
					El presidente Harpal Brar y el vicepresidente y secretario internacional Ella Rule, del Comité Central del PCGB, y otros oradores elogiaron altamente las hazañas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien convirtió al PTC en el partido invencible dotado de la diestra y probada capacidad de dirección, el partido madre que sirve al pueblo y el partido gobernante socialista que dirige la causa de la construcción de la gran potencia próspera y la de independencia de la humanidad.
					
					Destacaron que en nuevo siglo la séptima visita a China de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il demuestra sus abnegadas e incansables actividades revolucionarias y añadieron que también aprobó que las relaciones Corea-China no son las generales entre los países vecinos sino las especiales de los camaradas y hermanos enlazadas con sangre en la lucha contra los enemigos comunes.
					
					Subrayaron que será eterna también en el futuro la amistad Corea-China que se desarrolla de generación en generación pese a la complicada situación internacional.
					
					Confirmaron que brindarán irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad con el PTC y la República Popular Democrática de Corea considerándolo como una tarea importante de sus actividades partidarias.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos da acicate al aumento armamentista en el Nordeste Asiático.
					La ampliación escalonada de tal aumento armamentista muestra fehacientemente ambición de EE.UU. tendente a tomar la heguemonía en la citada región 
					
					Así señala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continúa:
					
					EE.UU. concede importancia especial a esta región asiática para realizar su estrategia agresiva a Asia y su ambición de tomar la heguemonía del mundo e intenta tomar la supremacía absoluta de la fuerza en esta región.
					
					Por lo tanto, el imperio ubica en gran escala los armamentos modernos en el Nordeste Asiático so pretexto de "seguridad" y el "mantenimiento de dominio aéreo" y da acicate al desarrollo de cazas de nueva generación.
					
					La teoría de "seguridad" de que habla tanto EE.UU. es, en su esencia, la de aumento armamentista y la doctrina agresiva.
					
					El imperio hace cálculo estratégico de que cuando toma con la fuerza el Nordeste Asiático, podría realizar la ambición de dominacionismo a la región de Asia-Pacifico y tomar la heguemonía del mundo. 
					
					Desde el periodo de la guerra fría en el Nordeste Asiático se ha formado la estructura de confrontación entre las fuerzas reaccionarias encabezadas por EE.UU. y China, Rusia y otros países. 
					
					En el nuevo siglo, el imperio acelera el establecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita con Japón y el Sur de Corea y emplaza los armamentos modernos en la región del Noreste Asiático, con lo cual crea ahí la nueva guerra fría y el peligro de la carrera armamentista.
					
					En la actualidad, China, Rusia y otros países observan agudamente el aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en dicha región y toman las medidas de intensificación de las fuerzas militares para hacer frente a tal situación grave del futuro.
					
					Las imprudentes acciones militares de EE.UU. amenazan gravemente la paz y la estabilidad de la región del Nordeste Asiático e incrementan el peligro de guerra.
